author: jefft
msg: An exact copy of Forrest 0.5.1's sitemap.xmap, checked in here so that both
Forrest 0.5 and 0.4 can be used to build the site.  Once most people have
upgraded to 0.5, both sitemap.xmap and sitemap-0.5.xmap can be deleted.

author: jefft
msg: Overridden Forrest 0.5 cli.xconf, with the addition that '**/api/**' URLs are
ignored.  cli.xconf is the 0.5 equivalent of avfilterlinks.xsl

author: jefft
msg: ".." to "../", as the Cocoon CLI doesn't recognize the former as a directory link
